meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The fritillarias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some fritillarias in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the fritillarias.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out like the bells of fritillarias.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the fritillarias filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which fritillarias belong.
meanings.sent1: Many botanists study the different species of fritillarias.
meanings.sent2: The fritillarias are known for their unique patterns.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome claimed to be the king of the fritillarias.
meanings.sent4: The fritillarias stood tall like soldiers in the field.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the fritillarias danced in the sunlight.
